result.eng: Shall I buy a bottle of wine?
result.html: An gceannóidh mé buidéal fíonaShall I buy a bottle of wine?
result.ponchtml: An gceannóiḋ mé buidéal fíonaShall I buy a bottle of wine?

result.eng: Wine and refreshements will be available.
result.ga: Beidh fíon agus sólaistí le fáil
result.orig: Beidh fíon agus sólaistí le fáil
result.html: Beidh fíon agus sólaistí le fáilWine and refreshements will be available.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ fíon agus sólaistí le fáilWine and refreshements will be available.

result.html: Fíon de dhéantús baileHome-made wine.
result.ponchtml: Fíon de ḋéantús baileHome-made wine.

result.html: Tá an fíon seo an-saorThis wine is very cheap.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fíon seo an-saorThis wine is very cheap.

result.html: Tá an fíon seo ródhaorThis wine is too expensive.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fíon seo róḋaorThis wine is too expensive.

result.html: An ólann tú fíonDo you drink wine?
result.ponchtml: An ólann tú fíonDo you drink wine?

result.eng: I drink neither wine nor whiskey.
result.html: Ní ólaim fíon ná fuisceI drink neither wine nor whiskey.
result.ponchtml: Ní ólaim fíon ná fuisceI drink neither wine nor whiskey.

result.html: Gloine fíona le do thoilGlass of wine, please.
result.ponchtml: Gloine fíona le do ṫoilGlass of wine, please.

result.html: Is breá liom fíon FrancachI love French wine.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom fíon FrancaċI love French wine.
